request.description:
This is the first step of the 3 factor authentication process. It verifies the profile password of the user. The temporary token received in the response is required to execute Step 2 of the 3 factor authentication.

| **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| username | "obortech" | Username of the user | true |
| password | "****" | Profile password of the user | true |

In the second step, it is required to verifiy the blockchain password of the user. After successful verification, this endpoint will send an OTP to user's registered mobile number. Use the temporary token received in response to complete the Step 3 of the 3 factor authentication

| **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| transactionPassword | "\*" | Blockchain password of the user | true |
| tempToken | "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cC........jFoFA" | temptoken token is obtained from profile password verification | true |

In the third and last step, provide the OTP received on the user's registered mobile number along with the temporary token received in Step 2 in order to get an access token (JWT) valid for next 8 hours.

| **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| otp | "703209" | OTP will be generated after verification of Blockchain password.OTP will be send to registered user mobile number. | true |
| tempToken | "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cC........jFoFA" | temptoken will generate from Blockchain password verification | true |

Fetch all projects

Need jwt token in authorization section which is obtained from Blockchain password verification.

Update project selection

| **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| project_id | 270 | unique id of project whose data can be referred from Fetch projects API | true |

Update project selection | **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | project_name | "api test project" | Name of the project | true | | item_name | "api item1" | Item Name from the item list | true | | container_name | "api grp1" | Container Name | true | | devices | \[{
"device_name": "API test Device",
"tag": "API test Device"
}\] | Devices from the Devices List | false | | group_name | "api grp3" | Group Name | true | | truck_name | "api grp2" | Truck name | true | | selectionTemperatureArray | \[ { "temperature_alert_min": 0, "temperature_alert_max": 8, "temperature_alert_interval": 7, "temperature_allowed_occurances": 5, "humidity_alert_min": 5, "humidity_alert_max": 1, "humidity_alert_interval": 1, "humidity_allowed_occurances": 0, "ambience_threshold": 44 } \] | | false | | item_is_start | null | Item Start Date | false | | item_start_date_time | null | Item End Date | false |

item.name: Fetch submission details (Events, Documents and PDCs) for a project

request.description: Fetch events and documents of a project by the numeric ID of the project

Add new project event | **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | event_id | v3qn9P3u | Unique id of events,The value can be selected from Fetch projects events and documents List API. | true | | due_date | 2022-11-18 18:30:00 | Due Date of the event | true | | document_deadline | 168 | Deadline of the document | true | | title | New event | Title of the Event | true | | description | Lorem ipsum | Description of the event | true | | location | Delhi | Location | true | | file | /home/Documents/image.png | Select a file. | true | | project_id | 270 | id of project.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "project_id" | true | | itemIds | \[{"itemID":"API Item","container_name":"API GRP1"}\] | itemID: Name of the item
container_name:Name of the container | true | | groupName | API GRP3 | Name of Group 3.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "groupID" | true | | truckName | API GRP2 | Name of Group 2.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "truckID" | true | | containerName | API GRP1 | Name of Group 1.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "containerID" | true | | itemName | API Item | Name of Item.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "itemID" | true | | pdcName | apipdc | Name of PDC. The data can be fetched from fetch project selections | true | | accept_users | obo9876,usr9648 | users who can accept the event. | true | | event_users | obo9876,usr9648 | user who can see the event. | true |

Add new project event | **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | event_id | v3qn9P3u | Unique id of Documents.The value can be selected from Fetch projects events and documents List | true | | due_date | 2022-11-18 18:30:00 | Due Date of the Document | true | | document_deadline | 168 | Deadline of the document | true | | title | New event | Title of the Document | true | | description | Lorem ipsum | Description of the Document | true | | location | Delhi | Location | true | | file | /home/Documents/image.png | Path of the file | true | | project_id | 270 | id of project.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "project_id" | true | | itemIds | \[{"itemID":"API Item","container_name":"API GRP1"}\] | itemID: Name of the item
container_name:Name of the container | true | | event_category_id | 124 | Id of Document categories.The value can be selected from Fetch projects events and documents List | true | | groupName | API GRP3 | Name of Group 3.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "groupID" | true | | truckName | API GRP2 | Name of Group 2.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "truckID" | true | | containerName | API GRP1 | Name of Group 1.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "containerID" | true | | itemName | API Item | Name of Item.The data can be selected from Fetch project selection Api using key "itemID" | true | | pdcName | apipdc | Name of PDC. The data can be fetched from fetch project selections | true | | accept_users | obo9876,usr9648 | users who can accept | true | | event_users | obo9876,usr9648 | All event users | true |

The event submission can be allowed to the specified organizations and users

| Key | **Value** | Description | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| orgName | "obortech" | Organization Name.The value can be obtained from key "name" inside organization object in Fetch project selection API's response | true |
| userName | "obo9876" | Unique Id.The value can be selected from key "unique_id" inside organization object in Fetch project selection API's response | true |
| eventName | "EVENT_v3qn9P3u" |  | true |
| pdc | "apitestprojectsodwiyjp" | Name of PDC. The data can be fetched from fetch project selections | true |
| orgs | \["ObortechMSP" \] | username of users in that project id.The value can be selected from key "username" in users array in Fetch project selection API | true |
| users | \[ "obo9876"\] | Unique Id.The value can be selected from key "username" inside users array in Fetch project selection API's response | true |

| **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| container_id | null | Id of container.It should be null to fetch alI data.The data is fetch from Fetch project selections from the key value of container_id | false |
| end_date_time | "2022-11-03 06:07:09" | The data is fetch from Fetch project selections from the key value of completed_date | false |
| eventId | 0 |  | false |
| group_id | null | It should be null to fetch alI data.The data is fetch from Fetch project selections from the key value of group_id | false |
| item_id | null | It should be null to fetch alI data.The data is fetch from Fetch project selections from the key value of item_id | false |
| limit | 20 | limit to fetch number of data at a time | true |
| offset | 0 | the starting index of the data | true |
| project_id | 1192 | The data is fetch from Fetch project selections from the key value of project_id | true |
| searchEventId | \[\] | Filter events according to eventId | false |
| search_text | "postman" | Filter events according to title. | false |
| start_date_time | 2022-10-20 09:25:26 | Start Date of the selected items. Also the data can be decided from Fetch project selections from the key value of start_date_time | false |
| truck_id | null | It Should be null to fetch all data.The data is fetch from Fetch project selections from the key value of truck_id | false |

Fetch all project events

Fetch project events and logs based on group name, truck name, container name and device name.

The value of the '**data_type**' path parameter can be events, humidity, temperature and location.

Payload sample to fetch **events**  
{  
"project_name":"api project",  
"group_name":"api group 1",  
"truck_name":"api group 2",  
"container_name":"api group 3",  
"device_name":"rcr52729",  
"orgName":"obortech",  
"userName":"obo9876"  
}

Payload sample to fetch **humidity, temperature and location logs**:  
{  
"project_name":"IOT",  
"item_name":"Task",  
"device_name":"rcr52729",  
"orgName":"obortech",  
"userName":"obo1589"  
}

| **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Value** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| project_name | "api test project" | Name of the project.The value can be obtained from key "projectName" in Fetch projects events API's response | true |
| group_name | "api grp3" | Group 3 Value.The value can be obtained from key "groupName" in Fetch projects events API's response | false |
| truck_name | "api grp2" | Group 2 Value.The value can be obtained from key "truckName" in Fetch projects events API's response | false |
| container_name | "api grp1" | Group 1 Value.The value can be obtained from key "containerName" in Fetch projects events API's response | false |
| device_name | "dev001" | Device Name.The value can be obtained from key "deviceName" in Fetch projects events API's response | false |

request.description:
Accept or reject the specified project event

params

| **Key** | **Value** | **Description** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| action | accept | approval status.It can be accept or reject | true |
| id | vre87blon | event_submission_id of the project.The value can be selected from "event_submission_id" key from fetch projects events and documents. | true |
